Abandoned, forgotten by God the trees in the deep Zone. Small, Small rusty lake filled with remains of cars, instills some kind of subconscious fear of the reality Zone. Beware of snipers, but remember, the Area favors the bold.

Abandoned army base - forever frozen trucks and Armoured personnel carriers, destroyed headquarters and barracks. But this solitude and desolation is deceptive - there is a treasure trove of artifacts, so the enemy can wait for you anywhere...Prove you're the best!

The old village - the place is creepy and twisted. But once ventured to get here, be prepared to get a bullet in the forehead. There is nowhere you can feel safe, but keep you optics and silencer.

The city of Pripyat, the former residence of the employees of the plant, or rather what's left of it. The ruins of this industrial skeleton are fraught with very real danger. Here we should really cherish life.
The city of Pripyat near nuclear power plants - the legacy of the Chernobyl disaster.
A small train station at the plant "germ."
A small train station at the plant "germ." Rusted cars and locomotives now stand on the eternal joke. Many artifacts lures here desperate of stalkers from all over the Area.

This plant under piles of metal and concrete walls holds a special kind of silence. In the last century there was in full swing, the workflow, the workers hurried to shift under the slogans of the speakers... But now the factory worked.
Abandoned old factory under piles of metal and concrete walls keeps a profound silence.
